use_cases_desc:
Local Area Artworks (LAA) in a month-long participatory art exhibition in a contemporary art gallery.
It was designed to engage visitors of the exhibition in collaboratively writing descriptions and interpretations of displayed artworks using their own personal devices.
contribution_desc: A zero-installation WiFi proximity detection approach using proximity-adaptive HTTP responses (PHAR). The reference implementation is a low-cost alternative to indoor WiFi positioning system
tracking_accuracy: 1-6 meters distance error based on device distance to sensor and user orientation
